mocafe.litforms

This subpackage contains some Phase-Field models presented in the scientific literature. Each model is implemented as a module. Each module contains a list of functions, each returning a PDE of the model coded in UFL.

Now the models implemented are:

  • prostate_cancer, which implements a Phase Field prostate cancer model described by Lorenzo and collaborators [LST+16].

  • xu2016, which implements a Phase Field cancer model described by Xu and collaborators [XVG16].

You can find full documentation for each module in the “Submodules” section below.

Submodules

  • mocafe.litforms.prostate_cancer
  • mocafe.litforms.xu16
